verses.verse: לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo not לָ֥נוּ La-nu יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Not unto us O LORD לֹ֫א <S%H3808><s%> lo not לָ֥נוּ La-nu כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- But לְ֭שִׁמְךָ <S%H8034><s%> Le-shim-cha not unto us but unto thy name תֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> ten give כָּב֑וֹד <S%H3519><s%> ka-Vod; glory עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- Because חַ֝סְדְּךָ֗ <S%H2617><s%> chas-de-cha, for thy mercy עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- because אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H571><s%> 'a-mit-Te-cha. [and] for thy truth's

לָ֭מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why יֹאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> yo-me-Ru say הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim; Wherefore should the heathen אַיֵּה־ <S%H346><s%> 'ai-yeh- Where נָ֝֗א <S%H4994><s%> Na, now אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Hem. angels

וֵֽאלֹהֵ֥ינוּ <S%H430><s%> ve-lo-Hei-nu But our God בַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> vash-sha-Ma-yim; [is] in the heavens כֹּ֭ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- he חָפֵ֣ץ <S%H2654><s%> cha-Fetz whatsoever he hath pleased עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah. he hath done

עֲ‍ ֽ֭צַבֵּיהֶם <S%H6091><s%> 'aTzab-bei-hem Their idols כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef [are] silver וְזָהָ֑ב <S%H2091><s%> ve-za-Hav; and gold מַ֝עֲשֵׂ֗ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh, the work יְדֵ֣י <S%H3027><s%> ye-Dei hands אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam. of men's

פֶּֽה־ <S%H6310><s%> peh- They have mouths לָ֭הֶם <S%H1992><s%> La-hem they וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo cannot יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Be-ru; but they speak עֵינַ֥יִם <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Na-yim not eyes לָ֝הֶ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem, they וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo cannot יִרְאֽוּ׃ <S%H7200><s%> yir-'U. have they but they see

אָזְנַ֣יִם <S%H241><s%> 'a-ze-Na-yim They have ears לָ֭הֶם La-hem וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo cannot יִשְׁמָ֑עוּ <S%H8085><s%> yish-Ma-'u; but they hear אַ֥ף <S%H639><s%> 'af not noses לָ֝הֶ֗ם la-Hem, וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo cannot יְרִיחֽוּן׃ <S%H7306><s%> ye-ri-Chun. have they but they smell

יְדֵיהֶ֤ם׀ <S%H3027><s%> ye-dei-Hem They have hands וְלֹ֬א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo cannot יְמִישׁ֗וּן <S%H4184><s%> ye-mi-Shun, but they handle רַ֭גְלֵיהֶם <S%H7272><s%> Rag-lei-hem not feet וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo cannot יְהַלֵּ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> ye-hal-Le-chu; have they but they walk לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- cannot יֶ֝הְגּ֗וּ <S%H1897><s%> yeh-Gu, not neither speak בִּגְרוֹנָֽם׃ <S%H1627><s%> big-ro-Nam. they through their throat

כְּ֭מוֹהֶם <S%H3644><s%> Ke-mo-hem like יִהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu will become עֹשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <S%H6213><s%> 'o-sei-Hem; They that make כֹּ֭ל <S%H3605><s%> kol Everyone אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who בֹּטֵ֣חַ <S%H982><s%> bo-Te-ach them are like unto them [so is] every one that trusteth בָּהֶֽם׃ ba-Hem.

יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'el O Israel בְּטַ֣ח <S%H982><s%> be-Tach trust בַּיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; thou in the LORD עֶזְרָ֖ם <S%H5828><s%> 'ez-Ram he [is] their help וּמָגִנָּ֣ם <S%H4043><s%> u-ma-gin-Nam and their shield הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. O

בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit O house אַ֭הֲרֹן <S%H175><s%> 'A-ha-ron of Aaron בִּטְח֣וּ <S%H982><s%> bit-Chu trust בַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; in the LORD עֶזְרָ֖ם <S%H5828><s%> 'ez-Ram he [is] their help וּמָגִנָּ֣ם <S%H4043><s%> u-ma-gin-Nam and their shield הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. that

יִרְאֵ֣י <S%H3373><s%> yir-'Ei Ye that fear יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD בִּטְח֣וּ <S%H982><s%> bit-Chu trust בַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; in the LORD עֶזְרָ֖ם <S%H5828><s%> 'ez-Ram he [is] their help וּמָגִנָּ֣ם <S%H4043><s%> u-ma-gin-Nam and their shield הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD זְכָרָ֪נוּ <S%H2142><s%> ze-cha-Ra-nu hath been mindful יְבָ֫רֵ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> ye-Va-Rech of us he will bless יְ֭בָרֵךְ <S%H1288><s%> Ye-va-rech [us] he will bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel יְ֝בָרֵ֗ךְ <S%H1288><s%> ye-va-Rech, he will bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit the house אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron. of Aaron

יְ֭בָרֵךְ <S%H1288><s%> Ye-va-rech He will bless יִרְאֵ֣י <S%H3373><s%> yir-'Ei them that fear יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD הַ֝קְּטַנִּ֗ים <S%H6996><s%> hak-ke-tan-Nim, [both] small עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- together הַגְּדֹלִֽים׃ <S%H1419><s%> hag-ge-do-Lim. and great

יֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3254><s%> yo-Sef shall increase יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem; and עֲ֝לֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem, and וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and בְּנֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei-Chem. you more and more you and your children

בְּרוּכִ֣ים <S%H1288><s%> be-ru-Chim Ye [are] blessed אַ֭תֶּם <S%H859><s%> 'At-tem you לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh, which made שָׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> va-'A-retz. and earth

הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim The heaven שָׁ֭מַיִם <S%H8064><s%> ma-yim [even] the heavens לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; [are] the LORD'S וְ֝הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ve-ha-'A-retz, but the earth נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan hath he given לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> liv-nei- to the children אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam. of men

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor הַ֭מֵּתִים <S%H4191><s%> Ham-me-tim The dead יְהַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> ye-hal-lu- praise יָ֑הּ <S%H3050><s%> Yah; not the LORD וְ֝לֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo, Nor כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any יֹרְדֵ֥י <S%H3381><s%> yo-re-Dei neither any that go down דוּמָֽה׃ <S%H1745><s%> du-Mah. into silence

וַאֲנַ֤חְנוּ׀ <S%H587><s%> va-'a-Nach-nu we נְבָ֘רֵ֤ךְ <S%H1288><s%> ne-Va-Rech But we will bless יָ֗הּ <S%H3050><s%> Yah, the LORD מֵֽעַתָּ֥ה <S%H6258><s%> me-'at-Tah this וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- from this time forth and for עוֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam, evermore הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> hal-lu- Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> Yah. the LORD
